definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: The analysis of on-job training investment on the base of mathematics.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，数学分析角度的在职培训投资分析。
经济学理论即数学分析。

sentences.english: This text is about the application of the method of enlarging and reducing in 《Mathematics Analyse》.
sentences.chinese: 本文旨在说明放缩法在《数学分析》中的应用。

sentences.english: The students in a topology course should have some knowledge of mathematical analysis and abstract algebra .
sentences.chinese: 拓扑学要求学生具备一些数学分析和抽象代数的基础。

sentences.english: After mathematical analysis we have elucidated the serious consequences resulted from misusing .
sentences.chinese: 我们通过数学分析阐明了由此产生严重的后果。

sentences.english: This article discusses the analyzing nature of Dirichlet function and Riemann function .
sentences.chinese: 黎曼函数在数学分析的学习中占有举足轻重的地位。

sentences.english: It can be said that mathematical analysis is infinitesimal analysis.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，数学分析就是无穷小分析。

sentences.english: The Riemann function in the mathematical analysis of learning play a vital role.
sentences.chinese: 黎曼函数在数学分析的学习中占有举足轻重的地位。

sentences.english: Extreme function analysis of the mathematical method is the important component.
sentences.chinese: 判别函数极值的方法是数学分析中的重要组成部分。
